title.narrative: JUVENILE JUSTICE

description.narrative: By the end of 2019, children and adolescents who are victims or witnesses to crimes and children and adolescents in conflict with the law will have access to specialized justice systems that guarantee their rights in a comprehensive way and promote their reintegration into society and their communities., which contributes to Access To Justice, Justice For Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Support the creation of a national integrated protection system

participating-org.narrative: RELAF RED LATINOAMERICANA DE ACOGIMIENTO FAMILIAR

sector.narrative: Alternative care reform and service provision
Justice sector workforce strengthening and capacity building (including police)
Justice, birth registration/CRVS, and alternative care - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use
Promoting diversion and alternatives to deprivation of liberty

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2019, children and adolescents who are victims or witnesses to crimes and children and adolescents in conflict withthe law will have access to specialized justice systems that guarantee their rights in a comprehensive way and promote theirreintegration into society and their communities.

description.narrative: UNICEF contributed to strengthening the child protection workforce in the justice sector to create a more specialized justice system with child friendly procedures. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2020

title.narrative: de Estados que desarrollan programas integrales de reintegracion y reinsercion social y comunitaria para la ejecucion de sanciones no privativas de la libertad con participacion del sector publico, privado y social.(45501)

baseline.value: Proyectos piloto en 3 estados para el desarrollo de programas integrales para la ejecucion de medidas no privativas dela libertad con participacion del sector publico y de sociedad civil.

target.value: 2019:Al menos 5 Estados que desarrollan programas integrales de reintegracion y reinsercion social y comunitaria para la ejecucion de sanciones no privativas de la libertad con participacion del sector
